features:
• New inspection: Missing parameter type https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-49595
  • Fixed: Method argument is not highlighted when cursor is on a variable in the method body https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-54558
  • Fixed: Don't consider variables as undefined based on DFA reachability https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-54713
  • Fixed: Unused import false positive when using parent FQCN as child class namespace https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-54254
  • Fixed: Trait collision false positive in case of usage of insteadof conflict resolution (PHP >= 7.3) https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WI-54284
  • Support vue-loader in file references in Vue template section https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-38331
  • Snowflake: Stored procedure syntax highlight feature: Javascript language syntax and SQL logic instead of simple text https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/DBE-11273
  • Fixed: Terminal shell path resets to default for the existing projects after updating to 2020.2 https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-246827
  • Fixed: "Windows Defender might impact performance" every time I open any project https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-247817
  • Fixed: Frequent hangs whilst typing: com.intellij.ui.ScreenUtil.calcInsets https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-226949
  • Fixed: Local History: WSL Local History is empty https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-241935
  • Fixed: Colorpicker doesn't work for setting TODO color https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-242989
  • Fixed: Right click on parametrized SQL query shows popup with parameters instead of context menu https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/DBE-11268
  • Fixed: Angular elements are shown as unknown in stylesheets https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-46751
  • Fixed: Project View: Cmd-Click file no longer adds file to selection https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-236737
  • Fixed: Extractor outputs binary strings as binary literals https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/DBE-8676
  • Fixed: Yarn 2: Typescript go to declaration moves to Import instead of declaration https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-43871
  • Fixed: KWallet access crashes intellij https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-241881
  • Fixed: Can't connect via SSH if there's a key that is not a file, or it is corrupted, or something similar https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-246307
  • Fixed: When GitHub Enterprise URL starts with "github.com" Pull Requests don't work https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-247259

Many other features and changes from the IntelliJ platform and web are also included.
See blog and release notes for more details.
